name: §a§nHigh Intelligence I
description: Merlings are naturally intelligent due to having to adapt to a constantly changing environment.

text: Just like Sea Turtles, you don't get to start in the water but rather on a Beach and you have to rush over to the waters in order to survive. Just think of it as Survival of the Fittest.
It may take a lot longer than usual for you to spawn in a Beach.
